updated_cases.title: Disable the notification-limit flag in staged_config.json
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Add the feature flag to disable 
{                                                                                
   "features": [                                                                  
     {                                                                            
       "name": "notification-limit",                                              
       "data": {                                                                  
         "enabled": false,                                                      
         "content-size": 0                                                    
       },                                                                         
       "apply-globally": true                                                     
     }                                                                            
   ]                                                                              
 }
2. Create useralert policy with default template
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. By default the flag is enabled and changing the flag to false should fall back to older behaviour of 3kb size limit.
2. with tss-on-browser, we should be getting block page instead of Useralert.
3. With tss-on-browser flag false, we should not see any block/useralert page

updated_cases.title: Disable the notification-limit flag in staged_config.json adn use custom template
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Add the feature flag to disable 
{                                                                                
   "features": [                                                                  
     {                                                                            
       "name": "notification-limit",                                              
       "data": {                                                                  
         "enabled": false,                                                      
         "content-size": 0                                                    
       },                                                                         
       "apply-globally": true                                                     
     }                                                                            
   ]                                                                              
 }
2. Create useralert policy with custom template
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. By default the flag is enabled and changing the flag to false should fall back to older behaviour of 3kb size limit.
2. with tss-on-browser, we should be getting custom useralert
3. With tss-on-browser flag false, we should not see any block/useralert page

updated_cases.title: Change the content size in staged_config.json
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Add the conten size in the flag
{                                                                                
   "features": [                                                                  
     {                                                                            
       "name": "notification-limit",                                              
       "data": {                                                                  
         "enabled": true,                                                      
         "content-size": 500                                                    
       },                                                                         
       "apply-globally": true                                                     
     }                                                                            
   ]                                                                              
 }
2. Create useralert policy with default_template
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. By default we should see the notification for  any foregorund request of any size and changing the content size should show notification eq or above the specified limit

updated_cases.title: Client based Useralert notification  with custom template for category matching tss
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create a policy for category matching the tss matcher
/opt/ns/dapii/tss_matcher_extension.json
2. Action is useralert and and template as custom template
updated_cases.custom_expected: Clicking on the proceed button should redirect to the original domain

updated_cases.custom_steps:

2. Action is useralert

updated_cases.title: Browser based block notification(less than <3kb)
updated_cases.custom_steps: 1. Create policy for app/category with action as block
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. We should see the block page even when the content lenght is less that 3kb

updated_cases.title: Client based block notification(less than <3kb)
updated_cases.custom_steps: 1. Create policy for app/category with action as block
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. We should see the block page even when the content lenght is less that 3kb

updated_cases.title: Browser based Useralert notification(less than <3kb)
updated_cases.custom_steps: 1. Create policy for app/category with action as useralert
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. We should see the useralert even when the content lenght is less that 3kb and clicking on proceed should redirect to actual domain
